name: Cloud Run
description:
Cloud Run is a platformer in which you activate the platforms as you go, by watering the barren soil with magic rain cannons and boosting your stats with potent elixirs!... - is what I would have written, but sadly magic isn't real (yet). Science, however, is!  And you can read all about these magic rain inducers' and health boosters' actual workings on our sites! (You were tricked, this was an educational game all along)

This game was made as part of the iGEM competition for the projects of 2 participating teams: team Vsycle and team Bubbly.
You can visit our wikis here, I mean, if you're interested (we hope so):

https://2020.igem.org/Team:UGent_Belgium

https://2020.igem.org/Team:UGent2_Belgium
